name: Auditorium 2: Duet
blurb: Auditorium Duet is the cooperative multiplayer sequel to Auditorium. Bend  light and fill music containers in harmony with a partner!
ksr_blurb: <p>After successfully launching Auditorium, a unique game that lets you manipulate sound and light, game studio Cipher Prime is ready to complete Auditorium 2. They're introducing cooperative gameplay so you can play with friends and explore all-new sonic puzzles.\u00a0</p>

rewards.reward: A huge "Thank You" and your name will be listed in the credits of Auditorium Duet.
You get a finished copy of Auditorium 2: Duet for PC/Mac. Plus the above rewards!
A PDF guide with strategies and solutions for all of Auditorium Duet's acts, in both single-player and multiplayer playlists. Plus the above rewards!
You get a finished copy of Auditorium 2: Duet for PC/Mac. Plus the above rewards!

An exclusive Auditorium Duet T-shirt, as well as exclusive Dev Note Access, which will include frequent progress reports and the ability to comment on the development of Auditorium Duet. Plus the above rewards!

The Duet Pack! You get an extra copy of the completed game! It is a game meant for two, after all! Feel free to gift the extra copy to any of your friends and family. You also get Dev Note Access. (Note that you only get the $30 T-shirt reward or the $30 extra game reward, but each does include the reward tiers above $30.)
Exclusive Dev Note Access, which will include frequent progress reports and the ability to comment on the development of Auditorium Duet. Plus the above rewards!

Backers at this level get a custom Supporter Edition of Auditorium 2 : Duet with a special single-player Act and multiplayer Act. You'll be able to play these sets of levels with friends on release and show your promoter status. Plus the above rewards!
A full-length mp3 soundtrack to Auditorium Duet, plus the accompanying sheet music in pdf format. Plus the above rewards!
Become an official Beta Tester and get a chance to help shape the game in it's infancy. Plus the above rewards!
An exclusive Auditorium Duet T-Shirt. Design still under consideration. Plus the above rewards!
A framed print. These will be high quality prints of either the gameplay or concept art. Plus the above rewards!
You will receive a custom hand-made Duet Supporter Plaque! Optional: we will put your photograph alongside your name in the credits in a very cool way. Plus the above rewards!

$500 dollars? Really? Who can give out this much money? This is so unbelievable that anyone who gives us $500 won't get anything special except for a mega-thanks and all the reward tiers below. But really, $500? That's crazy! If you're ever in Philly though, let us know and Dain Xavier Saint will make himself available to give you an hour long massage. He's done some amateur masseuse-ing on the side, and he works hard for his money. This will be followed by tea and a meal with the tea, all prepared and cooked by Mr. Saint himself, who is also an amateur chef. Then, post-dinner entertainment will incude a brief juggling show performed by Mr. William Stallwood with piano accompaniment by Dain X. Saint, who is no amateur pianist. Optional: you can then hang out and play Starcraft with us, no matter what league you're in (we're only silver).

A custom one-of-a-kind print, designed by Will Stallwood, OR a custom song, composed by Dain Saint. They will work with the backers to select a theme or inspiration for the final design or composition. Plus the above rewards!

Okay, aside from being immensely grateful to you, let's be completely honest here: you probably don't need cool swag if you can give us $2,000. What we'll do instead is stroke your ego. We'll skillfully photoshop your face onto a portrait of any artistic milieu you like (Renaissance? Impressionist? Cubist?), make a large wall poster print of it, and then frame it. And then it will grace the walls of the Cipher Prime Studios from now until the end of time.
